abstract: NFL Roundup; Andre Johnson, the Houston Texans’ All-Pro receiver, will sit out indefinitely after a procedure on his right hamstring; other NFL developments noted.
snippet: Andre Johnson, the Texans’ All-Pro receiver, will sit out indefinitely after a procedure on his right hamstring.
lead_paragraph: Andre Johnson, the Texans’ All-Pro receiver, will sit out indefinitely after a procedure on his right hamstring.

headline.seo: Andre Johnson to Miss Texans’ Next Game With Injury
